member.shortcv: Mr. NIKOLAOS KARANIKOLAS was born in Athens in 1980. He is a graduant of the departments of Informatics at AUEB. He is a fluent English speaker. He has worked as an instructor in basic computer skills seminars. >From July 2001 till July 2003 he was the technical administrator of the "Artificial Intelligence and Decision Support Systems" laboratory in AUEB. From October 2002 till now is a research assistant for the e-business research team Eltrun at AUEB. He has participated in the European committee funded project "Train-IT" and the Greek General Secretariat of Research and Technology funded project "PROMITHEAS".
